text: Space in front of heater must be under a roof.
Space in front of heater must not be a wall, door, or other heater.
Must be placed next to wall.
Must be placed along a fence.
Must be placed on a wall and facing a clear space.
A wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.
A lamp fueled by chemfuel, and can be safely placed outside.
An electrical standing lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.
A wall mounted device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
